main_definition: Avoidance of physical or mental effort; not wanting to work or use energy.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Reluctance to exert oneself physically, preferring inactivity and rest.
meanings_and_examples.example: After a week of hard work, John decided to spend the entire day on the couch watching TV.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Not willing to put effort into tasks or responsibilities; procrastination.
meanings_and_examples.example: Instead of doing his homework, Tim spent hours playing video games and cleaning his room last minute.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Indolence in the intellectual or creative sense, such as not thinking deeply about problems or being unproductive intellectually.
meanings_and_examples.example: Despite having a report due tomorrow, Alex spent hours on social media instead of researching and writing.
